issue.title: [Go][Parquet] Fix file offsets for row groups
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13996](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13996). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
PARQUET-2089 brought up an issue in the file offsets with the C++ implementation, and since the Go implementation is mostly a port of the C++ one, it has the same bug which needs to be fixed.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13996?focusedCommentId=17415569) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11153
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11153>
